Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 122 off 94 balls
Shreyas Iyer scored 82 off 56 balls with six sixes
Dilshan Madushanka took 5 wickets for 14 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
India ended their ICC trophy drought, winning their first title since 2013
